name: Forgiveness RPG: The First Chapter - Part Three
storyline:
As Jimmy leaves his home in Joppa Town, he befriends Esther, a witch who is looking for a magical stone to heal her mother...

Then, they both find themselves in the middle of a plot to take over the entire world! Can they stop this plot, and will Jimmy tell Esther that Jesus Christ can heal her mother, instead of the magic stone?
